channel.title: S3 on MBlog
channel.description: Recent content in S3 on MBlog

item.title: Upload Files to Aws S3
item.description: Upload single file to S3 bucket aws s3 cp sample2.txt s3://test-s3-bucket/data/ Upload all files from a folder to S3 bucket recursively aws s3 cp tmp/ s3://test-s3-bucket/data/tmp/ --recursive
